Make your event a success story

Safe, reliable and secure

Use mobile apps for iOS, Android and the WeChat mini-program for Chinese audiences

The API we provide allows to automate ticket downloads and utilize customer data to create business cards

Our powerful servers are located in Europe and Asia. This ensures platform operation anywhere in the world

Strong certifications ensure additional safety and security ensure additional safety and security

EventsWallet is an innovative SaaS event platform for in-person, virtual, and hybrid events. The platform allows expo and conference organisers to run an effective event by keeping the audience engaged with easy-to-use event management and communication web and app tools.
